Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Colonel Moammer el Gaddafi, leader of the Great September First Revolution of Libya, on the occasion of his birthday.
 It was conveyed to an official concerned by Ahmed Amer Al Muakaff, secretary of the People's Bureau of Libya in Pyongyang, on Feb. 19.

articles.content:
Greetings to Guyanese President
    Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Bharrat Jagdeo, president of Guyana, on February 18 on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the proclamation of the Cooperative Republic of Guyana.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms, the message wished the president and the people of Guyana greater success in their work for national unity and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans from Japan
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Syria Appointed
    Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK ambassador to Syria was appointed.
 According to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Pyong Nam was appointed as DPRK ambassador e. p. to Syria.

Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans from Japan
    Pyongyang, February 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan led by Jo Ryong Hyon, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, on a visit to the socialist homeland and had a conversation with it in a compatriotic atmosphere at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
